LinearRegression.hh

00004 // LinearRegression:
00005 //   
00006 
00007 #ifndef _LinearRegression_hh_
00008 #define _LinearRegression_hh_
00009 
00010 #include <math.h>
00011 
00012 typedef double Double_t;
00013 inline double sqr(double a) {return a*a;}
00014 
00017 class LinearRegression
00018 {
00019 public:
00020   LinearRegression() {reset();};
00021 
00024   void reset() {_sumOfWeights=0;_sumX=0; _sumY=0; _sumXX=0; _sumXY=0;_sumYY=0.;};
00025   
00026   ~LinearRegression() {};
00027 
00030   LinearRegression &add(Double_t x, Double_t y, Double_t y_error) {
00031     Double_t weight=sqr(1/y_error);
00032     _sumOfWeights+=weight;
00033     _sumX+=x*weight;
00034     _sumY+=y*weight;
00035     _sumXX+=x*x*weight;
00036     _sumXY+=x*y*weight;
00037     _sumYY+=y*y*weight;
00038     return *this;
00039   };
00040 
00043   LinearRegression &add(Double_t x, Double_t y) {
00044     _sumOfWeights+=1.;
00045     _sumX+=x;
00046     _sumY+=y;
00047     _sumXX+=x*x;
00048     _sumXY+=x*y;
00049     _sumYY+=y*y;
00050     return *this;
00051   };
00052 
00055   LinearRegression &add(const LinearRegression &a) {
00056     _sumOfWeights+=a._sumOfWeights;
00057     _sumX+=a._sumX;
00058     _sumY+=a._sumY;
00059     _sumXX+=a._sumXX;
00060     _sumXY+=a._sumXY;
00061     _sumYY+=a._sumYY;
00062     return *this;
00063   };
00064 
00068   LinearRegression &subtract(Double_t x, Double_t y, Double_t y_error) {
00069     Double_t weight=sqr(1/y_error);
00070     _sumOfWeights-=weight;
00071     _sumX-=x*weight;
00072     _sumY-=y*weight;
00073     _sumXX-=x*x*weight;
00074     _sumXY-=x*y*weight;
00075     _sumYY-=y*y*weight;
00076     return *this;
00077   };
00078 
00082   LinearRegression &subtract(Double_t x, Double_t y) {
00083     _sumOfWeights-=1.;
00084     _sumX-=x;
00085     _sumY-=y;
00086     _sumXX-=x*x;
00087     _sumXY-=x*y;
00088     _sumYY-=y*y;
00089     return *this;
00090   };
00091 
00095   LinearRegression &Subtract(const LinearRegression &a) {
00096     _sumOfWeights-=a._sumOfWeights;
00097     _sumX-=a._sumX;
00098     _sumY-=a._sumY;
00099     _sumXX-=a._sumXX;
00100     _sumXY-=a._sumXY;
00101     _sumYY-=a._sumYY;
00102     return *this;
00103   };
00104 
00107   LinearRegression &calc() {
00108     Double_t delta=_sumOfWeights*_sumXX-_sumX*_sumX;
00109     delta=1/delta;
00110     _ascent=(_sumXY*_sumOfWeights-_sumX*_sumY)*delta;
00111     _offset=(_sumY*_sumXX-_sumX*_sumXY)*delta;
00112     return *this;
00113   };
00114 
00117   LinearRegression &calcWithErrors() {
00118     Double_t delta=_sumOfWeights*_sumXX-_sumX*_sumX;
00119     delta=1/delta;
00120     _ascent=(_sumXY*_sumOfWeights-_sumX*_sumY)*delta;
00121     _offset=(_sumY*_sumXX-_sumX*_sumXY)*delta;
00122     if (_sumOfWeights>2.) {
00123       delta*=(_sumOfWeights*_sumYY-_sumY*_sumY)/(_sumOfWeights*(_sumOfWeights-2));
00124       _ascentError=sqrt(_sumOfWeights*delta);
00125       _offsetError=sqrt(_sumXX*delta);
00126     }
00127     else {
00128       _ascentError=0.;
00129       _offsetError=0.;
00130     }
00131     return *this;
00132   };
00133 
00137   Double_t offset() {return _offset;};
00138 
00142   Double_t ascent() {return _ascent;};
00143 
00148   Double_t eval(Double_t x) {return x*_ascent+_offset;};
00149 
00156   Double_t evalError(Double_t x, Double_t x_ref) {
00157     Double_t ascent_error=(x-x_ref)*_ascentError; 
00158     Double_t offset_error=_offsetError;
00159     return sqrt(offset_error*offset_error+ascent_error*ascent_error);
00160   };
00161 
00165   Double_t evalError(Double_t x) {
00166     if (_sumOfWeights>0.) {
00167       Double_t ascent_error=(x-_sumX/_sumOfWeights)*_ascentError; 
00168       Double_t offset_error=_offsetError;
00169       return sqrt(offset_error*offset_error+ascent_error*ascent_error);
00170     }
00171     else {
00172       return 0.;
00173     }
00174   };
00175 
00178   Double_t sumOfWeights() {
00179     return _sumOfWeights;
00180   };
00181   
00182   Double_t _ascent;
00183   Double_t _offset;
00184   Double_t _ascentError;
00185   Double_t _offsetError;
00186 
00187   Double_t _sumOfWeights;
00188   Double_t _sumX;
00189   Double_t _sumY;
00190   Double_t _sumXX;
00191   Double_t _sumXY;
00192   Double_t _sumYY;
00193 };
00194 
00195 #endif
